ygData.subject: Re: Re: Time for a new weapon
ygData.msgSnippet: ... From: Jason Rochelle  To:  Sent: Thursday, December 16, 1999 11:55 PM Subject: [eqbards] Re: Time for a new weapon
ygData.messageBody:
----- Original Message -----
From: Jason Rochelle <Jasroc@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, December 16, 1999 11:55 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Re: Time for a new weapon


> From: Jason Rochelle <Jasroc@...>

> Brazen Brass Kilij? sure I know the damage is good on it, but the
> WEIGHT! What are you a Barbarian Bard? (totally skipping the part about
> how rare the low level SG is and how he is instantly mobbed by everyone
> who /cons him and says "hrmm, that SG is even to me!" AND the fact that
> according to sceeen shots posted here his name is NOT "sand giant" but
> "a sand giant" just like all the other sand giants in the desert).
>
> > Uldar Ulfangson
> 35th Bard, Rodcet Nife
Uldar believe it or not, I saw "a sand giant" not 30 minutes in the zone-
it conned blue, but as I am having terrible LD problems lately, I
shouted for help-a nearby lvl 40 SK killed it-then said to me- he's got
plans on him you want em?!.......uhhhhhhh........YEAH! :)
Got the plans, got the gold, friend enchanted gold for me, got the BBK.
All in about an hour and a half.-only thing is I hate the look of
scimitars- could they make em any bigger?
As for Staff of W., im saving my cash for gems for my armor- and I'm one
of them poor bards :).-Someday-
Scanna Swarzeneggar (sp?)
34th Chorus
Bertoxx
